description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your finger to knock the Eye-Ball past your opponent to score a Point. Gain points to win a Set. Win sets to win the Match! It's a little bit of pong and a little bit of tennis - just with a whole lot of eye poking! So when playing Eye-Ball, play it safe - don't blink (it could be dangerous).
